entry.title: Sign Ups for Courses
entry.content: Hi everyone! This semester, 2 new courses are up, namely Introduction to Python and Introduction to Web Development! Do sign up here!
entry.summary: Hi everyone! This semester, 2 new courses are up, namely Introduction to Python and Introduction to Web Development! Do sign up here!

entry.title: Visit Us @IG Fair!
entry.content: Today, rc4code would be having a booth in the IG Fair @ 730-9PM! Do check us out at our booth @ MPSH!
entry.summary: Today, rc4code would be having a booth in the IG Fair @ 730-9PM! Do check us out at our booth @ MPSH!

entry.title: Welcome to rc4code
entry.content: Welcome to rc4code! This is the blog where updates on rc4code and its activities would be logged. Keep a watch out for our news (subscribe to our RSS feed), latest projects and events, and more functions would be coming soon!
